programme.title: 1991 Cambodian peace treaty
programme.short_synopsis: Cambodian dictator Pol Pot is compared to Saddam Hussein and Fidel Castro.
programme.medium_synopsis: The 1991 Cambodian peace treaty is signed in Paris. Alistair Cooke compares the rehabilitation of dictator Pol Pot to Cuba's Fidel Castro and Iraq's Saddam Hussein.
